reporter_caption.center: IN MATTER OF APPEAL OF PACULA, 682P05 (N.C. 1-26-2006)

caption.center: IN THE MATTER OF: APPEAL OF RICHARD S. PACULA from the decision of the
Brunswick County Board of Equalization and Review concerning real property
taxation for tax year 2003 appealed by Richard S. Pacula.

opinion.attorneys:
Richard S. Pacula, Pro Se.
Jana L. Berg, Assistant County Attorney, for Wake County/PTC.
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER Upon consideration of the petition filed by Appellant (Richard Pacula) on the 8th day of December 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:
Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of January 2006.
